turkish_example_sentence: Siz kültürlü ve eğitimli insanlar olursunuz ve toplumda saygı görürsünüz.
english_example_sentence: You are cultured and educated people and you are respected in society.
russian_example_sentence: Вы культурные и образованные люди и вас уважают в обществе.
